ai-tha-ap134:1.1_0: “Sāriputta, on the bank of the river,
ai-tha-ap134:1.4_0: I saw the benefit of the world,
ai-tha-ap134:2.1_0: Seeing Ketaka, the caught in flower,
ai-tha-ap134:2.2_0: I’ve cut the in the vicinity,
ai-tha-ap134:2.3_0: I rejoice in the Buddha’s instruction.
ai-tha-ap134:3.1_0: he has attained a knowledge master.
ai-tha-ap134:3.3_0: I know that this is a knowledge master.
ai-tha-ap134:3.4_0: a great sage in honor of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap134:4.2_0: I saw an eyebrows like a trunk,
ai-tha-ap134:4.4_0: this knowledge which is the fruit of knowledge.
ai-tha-ap134:5.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap134:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap134:5.4_0: this knowledge which is the fruit of knowledge.
ai-tha-ap134:6.2_0: who twelve years old is fruitful.
ai-tha-ap134:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sudassana.
ai-tha-ap134:9.1_0: Seeing the second of the Elder Sudassana
